org.common.interfaces
Interface PapinhoServerIface

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
PapinhoServer
public interface PapinhoServerIface
extends java.rmi.Remote

Interface for the server application remote object.

Method Detail

sendMessage

void sendMessage(ChatMessage msg)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Broadcasts a message to all connected clients

Parameters:
msg - A ChatMessage instance that contains the message to send.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - RemoteException is thrown by RMI, if a communication error occurs.

sendMessage

void sendMessage(ChatMessage msg,
                 java.lang.String to)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Sends a message to a specific user with name to

Parameters:
msg - A ChatMessage instance that contains the message to send.
to - Name of the user the message has to be sent to.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - RemoteException is thrown by RMI, if a communication error occurs; or by this function when the recipient of the message is not connected

addClient

SessionStatus addClient(java.lang.String name,
                        java.rmi.Remote stub)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Remote method that registers a new user as connected and notifies all other connected users. This method is called when a chat client wants to connect to the chat server.

Parameters:
name - Name of the user associated with the client
stub - Remote stub for the instance of the chat client's remote object.
Returns:
Returns an instance of SessionStatus containing the user list and the current chat history.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - RemoteException is thrown in case of a communication problem.

clientNameChange

void clientNameChange(java.lang.String oldName,
                      java.lang.String newName)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Remote method that changes the name of a connected user and notifies all other connected users.

Parameters:
oldName - Old name of the user that is to be renamed
newName - New name of the client that is to be renamed.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - RemoteException is thrown in the eventuality of a communication error.

removeClient

void removeClient(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Remote method that unregisters a client and notifies all other connected users. This method is called by the chat client when its user disconnects from the server.

Parameters:
name - Name of the user to be unregistered
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - RemoteException is thrown in case of a communication problem.
